title: Collaboration / Ensemble
description: Represents a group of people working together, such as a band, team, or artist collective.

collaborationId.description: A unique identifier for the collaboration.

collaborationName.description: The name of the collaboration or ensemble.

type.description: The type of collaboration (e.g., 'Music Band', 'Sports Team', 'Artist Collective').

website.description: The official website or main social media link for the group.

foundingDate.description: The date the collaboration was formed.

description.description: A brief description of the collaboration.

members.description: A list of members of the collaboration, with their specific roles.

personId.description: The unique identifier of the member.

role.description: The member's role within the group (e.g., 'Lead Singer', 'Quarterback', 'Lead Artist').

phoneNumbers.description: A list of contact numbers for the collaboration.

emailAddresses.description: A list of official email addresses for the collaboration.

type.description: The type of email address (e.g., 'general inquiries', 'media').

addresses.description: A list of physical addresses for the collaboration's key locations (e.g., studio, venue).
